Uses of Package
com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor

  • Packages that use com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor 
    Package Description
    com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.config  
    com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor  
    com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.function  
    com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.internal

  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.config 
    Class Description
    ClusteredExecutorService
    An Oracle Coherence based TaskExecutorService.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor 
    Class Description
    RemoteExecutor
    A RemoteExecutor allows submitting and/or scheduling runnables and callables for execution within a Coherence cluster.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.function 
    Class Description
    ExecutionPlan
    Defines proposed ExecutionPlan.Actions for assigning a Task to zero or more Executors for execution.
    Result
    An immutable container representing an intermediate or final result produced by executing a Task, typically by an individual Executor, including no result, a specific value or a Throwable.
    TaskExecutorService.ExecutorInfo
    Provides access to the currently available information for a registered ExecutorService.
    TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option
    An TaskExecutorService.Registration.Option for an ExecutorService when registered.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.internal 
    Class Description
    ClusteredTaskManager.State
    The state of the ClusteredTaskManager.
    ComposableContinuation
    This extension allows composition of Continuations.
    ContinuationService
    A service for tracking, composing and executing ComposableContinuations.
    PortableAbstractProcessor
    A portable AbstractProcessor. a convenience interface for implementations having no properties to serialize.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.internal.cdi 
    Class Description
    RemoteExecutor
    A RemoteExecutor allows submitting and/or scheduling runnables and callables for execution within a Coherence cluster.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.processors 
    Class Description
    PortableAbstractProcessor
    A portable AbstractProcessor. a convenience interface for implementations having no properties to serialize.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.subscribers 
    Class Description
    Task.Subscription
    Represents a subscription a Task.Subscriber has made to a Task.Coordinator, allowing control and termination of the Task.Subscription.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.subscribers.internal 
    Class Description
    Result
    An immutable container representing an intermediate or final result produced by executing a Task, typically by an individual Executor, including no result, a specific value or a Throwable.
    Task.Coordinator
    A publisher of collected Task results that additionally permits coordination of the submitted Task.
    Task.Subscription
    Represents a subscription a Task.Subscriber has made to a Task.Coordinator, allowing control and termination of the Task.Subscription.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.tasks 
    Class Description
    Task
    A task that may take a long time to execute, may be executed by multiple Executors, may generate intermediate results, and may yield for later execution.
    Task.Context
    Provides contextual information for a Task as it is executed, including the ability to access and update intermediate results for the Executor executing the said Task.
  • Classes in com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor used by com.oracle.coherence.concurrent.executor.tasks.internal 
    Class Description
    Task.Context
    Provides contextual information for a Task as it is executed, including the ability to access and update intermediate results for the Executor executing the said Task.
